Sentencas: An amorphous reduced form of oxide ion conductor La2Mo2O9 had been proposed as sulfur-tolerant anode material for solid oxide fuel cell, but its oxygen content was not known.
Titulo: Reduction Kinetics of La2Mo2O9 and Phase Evolution during Reduction and Reoxidation

Sentencas: In this paper, we investigate the reduction kinetics by diluted hydrogen of La2Mo2O9 to amorphous, and the oxygen range of the amorphous form.
Titulo: Reduction Kinetics of La2Mo2O9 and Phase Evolution during Reduction and Reoxidation

Sentencas: The reduction kinetics is studied as a function of the powder specific surface area and of the temperature, on powders synthesized by solid state reaction and by polyol process using two different solvents.
Titulo: Reduction Kinetics of La2Mo2O9 and Phase Evolution during Reduction and Reoxidation

Sentencas: The reduction process was carried out by TGA under 10% H-2 diluted in argon, and its kinetics is analyzed and modeled.
Titulo: Reduction Kinetics of La2Mo2O9 and Phase Evolution during Reduction and Reoxidation

Sentencas: As expected, small particles and high temperature lead to higher reduction rates.
Titulo: Reduction Kinetics of La2Mo2O9 and Phase Evolution during Reduction and Reoxidation

Sentencas: Several reduction steps were identified by XRD during the process.
Titulo: Reduction Kinetics of La2Mo2O9 and Phase Evolution during Reduction and Reoxidation

Sentencas: At 700 degrees C La2Mo2O9 is directly reduced into the amorphous phase La2Mo2O7-y, whereas at 760 degrees C reduction occurs through an intermediate crystallized La7Mo7O30 congruent to La2Mo2O8.57) phase before amorphization.
Titulo: Reduction Kinetics of La2Mo2O9 and Phase Evolution during Reduction and Reoxidation

Sentencas: In both cases, further reduction of La2Mo2O62 amorphous phase leads to an exsolution of metallic molybdenum and a molybdenum deficiency in the amorphous phase.
Titulo: Reduction Kinetics of La2Mo2O9 and Phase Evolution during Reduction and Reoxidation

Sentencas: Reoxidation of amorphous La2Mo2O7-y was studied by TGA, DTA and XRD.
Titulo: Reduction Kinetics of La2Mo2O9 and Phase Evolution during Reduction and Reoxidation

Sentencas: At low temperature in air, the reduced compounds are reoxidized while remaining amorphous.
Titulo: Reduction Kinetics of La2Mo2O9 and Phase Evolution during Reduction and Reoxidation

Sentencas: The annealing for 60 h at 350 degrees C in air of reduced La2Mo2O6.66, obtained beforehand by solid state reaction, gives an amorphous phase with composition La2Mo2O8.85.
Titulo: Reduction Kinetics of La2Mo2O9 and Phase Evolution during Reduction and Reoxidation

Sentencas: The existence domain of the reduced amorphous phase in terms of oxygen content therefore ranges at least from O-6.2 to O-8.85, thus including the composition La2Mo2O8.50 of the amorphous surface layer at the origin of a huge increase of ionic conductivity recently reported in nanowires of La2Mo2O9.
Titulo: Reduction Kinetics of La2Mo2O9 and Phase Evolution during Reduction and Reoxidation
